title: How to Make DuckDuckGo the Default Search Engine in Chrome

steps.title: Open Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome. It has an icon that resembles a red, green, and yellow wheel with a blue dot in the middle. You'll find it on your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the menu icon ⋮ or ….
steps.content: Tap the menu icon ⋮ or … . It's the icon with three vertical dots (Android) or three horizontal dots (iPhone and iPad) in the upper-right corner of Google Chrome. This opens the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's in the menu that appears when you tap the icon with three dots in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Search engine.
steps.content: Tap Search engine . It's the first option at the top of the Settings menu. This displays a list of search engines you can choose as your default search engine.

steps.title: Tap DuckDuckGo.
steps.content: Tap DuckDuckGo . It's in the list of search engines. This makes DuckDuckGo as your default search engine.

steps.title: Open Google Chrome .
steps.content: Open Google Chrome . It has an icon that resembles a red, green, and yellow wheel with a blue dot in the middle. On Windows, click the Google Chrome icon on your desktop or Windows menu. On Mac, click the Google Chrome icon in the Dock or your Applications folder.

steps.title: Click the menu icon ⋮.
steps.content: Click the menu icon ⋮ . It's the icon with three vertical dots in the upper-right corner. This displays the menu.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . It's in the menu that appears when you click the icon with three vertical dots in the upper-right corner. This opens the Settings menu.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Manage search Engines.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Manage search Engines . It's below the "Search engine" header. This displays a list of search engines along with a list of default search engines you can select from. Alternatively, you can use the drop-down menu next to "Search engine used in address bar" in the Settings menu to select DuckDuckGo as your default search engine.

steps.title: Click ⋮ next to "DuckDuckGo".
steps.content: Click ⋮ next to "DuckDuckGo". DuckDuckGo is listed below the "Default search engines" list at the top along with Google, Bing, Yahoo, and Ecosia. DuckDuckGo has an orange icon with an image of a duck. If you don't see this DuckDuckGo in the list of default search engines, click Add below "Default search engines. Enter "DuckDuckGo" in the search engine and keyword spaces. Then enter "https://duckduckgo.com" as the URL and click Add .

steps.title: Click Make Default.
steps.content: Click Make Default . It's the first option in the menu that appears when you click the icon with three dots next to "DuckDuckGo" in the list of default search engines. This makes DuckDuckGo your default search engine.
